amendment.description: To amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to require the provision of a child safety lock in connection with the transfer of a handgun.

action.text: Amendment SA 1626 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Kohl.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1626 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 30. Record Vote Number: 207.
